root.name: Legend of Wukong
root.description: Originally a Taiwanese Sega Genesis RPG game developed by Gametec, the game was translated to English 12 years after its original release by Super Fighter Team. Legend of Wukong was the second game for the Sega Genesis to be commercially released in the United States since 1998.

similar_games.game: LandStalker: The Treasures of King Nole
Phantasy Star IV: The End of the Millennium
Phantasy Star III: Generations of Doom
